Thought you might like this too. #TheSuicideSquad
 
https://www.facebook.com/thesuicidesquad
https://www.instagram.com/thesuicidesquad
https://twitter.com/SuicideSquadWB
https://www.thesuicidesquad.com
 
From writer/director James Gunn comes Warner Bros. Picturesâ€™ superhero action adventure â€œThe Suicide Squad,â€ featuring a collection of the most degenerate delinquents in the DC lineup.
 
Welcome to hellâ€”a.k.a. Belle Reve, the prison with the highest mortality rate in the US of A.  Where the worst Super-Villains are kept and where they will do anything to get outâ€”even join the super-secret, super-shady Task Force X.  Todayâ€™s do-or-die assignment?  Assemble a collection of cons, including Bloodsport, Peacemaker, Captain Boomerang, Ratcatcher 2, Savant, King Shark, Blackguard, Javelin and everyoneâ€™s favorite psycho, Harley Quinn.  Then arm them heavily and drop them (literally) on the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese.  Trekking through a jungle teeming with militant adversaries and guerrilla forces at every turn, the Squad is on a search-and-destroy mission with only Colonel Rick Flag on the ground to make them behaveâ€¦and Amanda Wallerâ€™s government techies in their ears, tracking their every movement.  And as always, one wrong move and theyâ€™re dead (whether at the hands of their opponents, a teammate, or Waller herself).  If anyoneâ€™s laying down bets, the smart money is against themâ€”all of them. 
 
The film stars Margot Robbie (â€œBirds of Prey,â€ â€œBombshellâ€), Idris Elba (â€œAvengers: Infinity Warâ€), John Cena (upcoming HBO Max series â€œPeacemaker,â€ â€œBumblebeeâ€), Joel Kinnaman (â€œSuicide Squadâ€), Jai Courtney (the â€œDivergentâ€ franchise), Peter Capaldi (â€œWorld War Z,â€ BBCâ€™s â€œDoctor Whoâ€ ), David Dastmalchian (upcoming â€œDune,â€ â€œAnt-Man and the Waspâ€), Daniela Melchior (â€œParque Mayerâ€), Michael Rooker (the â€œGuardians of the Galaxyâ€ films), Alice Braga (â€œElysiumâ€), Pete Davidson (â€œThe King of Staten Island,â€ TVâ€™s â€œSaturday Night Liveâ€), JoaquÃ­n Cosio (â€œSpider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse,â€ TVâ€™s â€œNarcos: Mexicoâ€), Juan Diego Botto (â€œThe Europeansâ€), Storm Reid (â€œThe Invisible Man,â€ â€œA Wrinkle in Timeâ€, â€œEuphoriaâ€), Nathan Fillion (â€œGuardians of the Galaxy,â€ TVâ€™s â€œThe Rookieâ€), Steve Agee (â€œBrightburn,â€ â€œGuardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2â€), Sean Gunn (the â€œGuardians of the Galaxyâ€ films, the â€œAvengersâ€ films), Mayling Ng (â€œWonder Womanâ€), Flula Borg (â€œRalph Breaks the Internetâ€), Jennifer Holland (â€œBrightburn,â€ upcoming HBO Max series â€œPeacemakerâ€) and Tinashe Kajese (TVâ€™s â€œValor,â€ â€œThe Inspectorsâ€), with Sylvester Stallone (the â€œRocky,â€ â€œRamboâ€ and â€œExpendablesâ€ franchises), and Viola Davis (â€œMa Raineyâ€™s Black Bottom,â€ â€œSuicide Squadâ€).
 
Gunn (the â€œGuardian of the Galaxyâ€ films) directs from his own screenplay, based on characters from DC.  The film is produced by Charles Roven and Peter Safran, with Zack Snyder, Deborah Snyder, Walter Hamada, Chantal Nong Vo, Nikolas Korda and Richard Suckle executive producing.
 
Gunnâ€™s creative team includes director of photography Henry Braham (â€œGuardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2â€), production designer Beth Mickle (â€œCaptain Marvelâ€), editors Fred Raskin (â€œGuardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2,â€ â€œOnce Upon a Timeâ€¦ In Hollywoodâ€) and Christian Wagner (the â€œFast & Furiousâ€ films) and Oscar-nominated costume designer Judianna Makovsky (â€œGuardians of the Galaxy Vol 2,â€ â€œAvengers: Endgame,â€ â€œHarry Potter and the Sorcererâ€™s Stoneâ€).  The music is by John Murphy (â€œKick-Assâ€).
 
Warner Bros. Pictures Presents An Atlas Entertainment/Peter Safran Production, A James Gunn Film, â€œThe Suicide Squad.â€  The film will be distributed worldwide by Warner Bros. Pictures.  It is set for release nationwide in theaters and IMAX on August 6, 2021 and will be available on HBO Max for 31 days from theatrical release.
